content: k2tog 12 times 48 k one round k2 k2tog 12 times 36 k one round k1 k2tog 12 times 24 k one round k2tog 12 times 12 k2tog 6 times 6 knit one round this evens up the stitches i knit 2 3-stitch icords with the remaining 6 stitches and tacked them down alternately cut the yarn and use the tapestry needle to draw the stitches tight and secure the end or add a pompom work in the ends wash block and wear when adjusting the pattern just remember to keep the stitches a multiple of 4 - when using 4 colors you can do the helix pattern with 3 4 5 or more colors just make sure the number of co stitches is divisible by the number of colors you are using
